In this transferred post, we have changed the attributional style from stable to unstable. The original post attributes the cause of suicidal thoughts to the individual's own mental health struggles, implying that they are chronically prone to such thoughts. In contrast, the transferred post suggests that the suicidal thoughts could be due to temporary factors such as stress from work or personal relationships, or a temporary mental health struggle. This change in attributional style could help the individual see their situation in a more positive light and feel more hopeful about their ability to recover.
